title: Vera Bradley: Up to 50% off + Free Shipping
content:
Vera Bradley fans! Vera Bradley is having a really fun weekend sale with up to 50% off and FREE shipping. This makes for really fun deals on accessories and purses. 
 Deal Idea  

 
Small Cosmetic Bag , $11 (reg. $22) 
 
Shipping is FREE. 
 
See more online shopping deals.
